thread.title: Ed Sheeran Puts His Acoustic Spin On Little Mix's Touch! Watch!
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran Puts His Acoustic Spin On Little Mix's Touch! Watch!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Ed Sheeran Puts His Acoustic Spin On Little Mix's Touch! Watch!
text:
2/21/2017 5:38 PM ET | Filed under: Music Minute ‚Ä¢ Twitter ‚Ä¢ Ed Sheeran ‚Ä¢ One Direction ‚Ä¢ Little Mix ‚Ä¢ Harry Styles 
Ed Sheeran can cover a ‚Äò90s internet dial tone and still make it sound like a hit. 
So the British crooner had no trouble gifting us with a flawless cover of Little Mix 's Touch ! 
The Shape Of You singer made some shocking revelations when he stopped by the BBC One Live Lounge ‚Äî from his thoughts on Harry Styles ' new album to his love for a certain U.K. girl group! 
Related: Ed Gives ALL The Feels With New Song How Would You Feel ! 
During the chat, Ed said he took a listen to the former One Direction singer's new music, and confirmed "it's great." Phew! 
But his real obsession came out when the 26-year-old admitted to being a "Little Mix fangirl" ‚Äî and proved it by covering their booty-popping song! 
Of course, Ed's version was much more understated than the OG, but could totally be a radio hit on it's own. Ch-ch-check it out (below)! 
And yes, the girls voiced their approval of the Sheeranian cover, sharing their reaction on Twitter : 
Ye @edsheeran üëèüëèüëèüëè smashed it! Thanks for doing #Touch x the girls x https://t.co/0SI2TfrZCS ‚Äî Little Mix (@LittleMix) February 21, 2017 
Ed can do no wrong! 
Want more? Watch Ed's full Radio One interview ‚Äî and performances ‚Äî (below)!
